text: aur (musalamaanon) tumhaare etaraaf (aas paas) ke gaivaar dehaatiyon mein se baaz munaaphiq (bhee) hain aur khud madeene ke rahane vaalon me se bhee (baaz munaaphiq hain) jo nifaak par ad gae hain (ai rasool) tum un ko nahin jaanate (magar) ham unako (khoob) jaanate hain anaqareeb ham (duniya mein) unakee doharee saza karegen phir ye log (qayaamat mein) ek bade azaab kee taraph lautae jaainge
